name: PongToss
description:
Hey,

PongToss is a  game I created within a week for the Homa Games Monthly Jam! This month's theme was distance, so how well can you throw a ping pong ball, and how far can you get in the levels?!

Good luck, and have fun!

PS. More levels and development (fixes!) to come, so be sure to stop by again sometime!
-From Chris

Hotfix 12.19.18 - Highscore on startup bug fixed.
